wsdl:operation.name: HelloWorld
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: HelloWorld method to validate the access to Web Services from every very light HTTP client via Javascript for example

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: Text to pass to test consumption.

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns the text typed upon entry, concatenated with phrase 'Hello You'

wsdl:operation.name: GetAvailableLoyaltyPoints
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the points available on a loyalty card.

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: Identifier of the loyalty card. - Related to column [MCARETFIDENT.MFC_NUMCARTE]

wsdl:operation.name: GetCustomerAvailableLoyaltyPoints
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Returns the customer's available loyalty points.

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: Reference enabling the identification of the customer.

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns the available loyalty points for the customer found.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateLoyaltyCard
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: Enables the creation of a loyalty card.

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: Reference enabling the identification of the customer. - Related to column [MCARETFIDENT.MFC_TIERS]

wsdl:output.wsdl:documentation: Returns the number of the card created. - Related to column [MCARETFIDENT.MFC_NUMCARTE]

wsdl:operation.name: GetCustomerCards
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/04 - V1102] - Returns the list of loyalty cards associated with a customer.

wsdl:operation.name: GetLoyaltyCard
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/04 - V1102] - Returns information from a loyalty card

wsdl:input.wsdl:documentation: Identifier of the loyalty card - Related to column [MCARETFIDENT.MFC_NUMCARTE]

wsdl:operation.name: GetLoyaltyPointsForSale
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/05 - V1102] - Returns the loyalty points earned for an existing sales document.

wsdl:operation.name: UpdatePoints
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2013/10 - V1104] [Beta] - Enables the update of points on a given loyalty card.

wsdl:operation.name: CreateExternCard
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2016/04 - V1110] [Beta] - Allows the creation of a loyalty card from an external system

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateProgram
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2016/04 - V1110] [Beta] - Allows the update of the loyalty program on the customer's card

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateValidityPeriod
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2016/04 - V1110] [Beta] - Allows the update of the validity dates on the customer's card

wsdl:operation.name: UpdateCardId
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2016/04 - V1110] [Beta] - Allows the card number to be updated

wsdl:operation.name: CloseCard
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2016/04 - V1110] [Beta] - Allows the customer's active card to be closed

wsdl:operation.name: ReOpenCard
wsdl:operation.wsdl:documentation: [Added 2016/04 - V1110] [Beta] - Allows a closed card to be reopened

wsdl:service.name: LoyaltyWcfService
wsdl:service.wsdl:documentation: Web Service contract for managing customer loyalty. Uses V2 loyalty.
